channel.title: chutni on Chilli Clove | Recipes, Travel and Lifestyle | by Priyanka
channel.description: Recent content in chutni on Chilli Clove | Recipes, Travel and Lifestyle | by Priyanka

item.title: Chutni for Momo (मोमो साठी चटणी)
item.description: English Chutni for Momos Ingredients: 3-5 red dried chilies (preferably less tangy), 1 medium sized tomato, 1 spoon oil, One tablespoon of finely chopped garlic, Fine spoon of finely chopped ginger, 1 spoon sugar, Salt to taste.

item.title: Jawas chutni (जवसाची चटणी)
item.description: English Ingredients: Procedure: Marathi जवसाची चटणी साहित्य: जवस १०० ग्रॅ ५-६ सुक्या लाल मिरच्या (गुंटूर मिरच्या), २ चमचे जिरे, मीठ कृती: जवस व लाल मिरच्या कढईमधे घालून एकदम हलका धूर येईपर्यंत भाजून घ्यावे.
